member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.AirMediaAPI.AirMediaConfig.Password
member.summary: If not empty, the client will have to enter a password to be able to use this airmedia server.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.AirMediaAPI.AirMediaErrors.unknown_target
member.summary: No airmedia device with this name in range.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.AirMediaAPI.AirMediaErrors.bad_remote_id
member.summary: No remote control with this id.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.AirMediaAPI.AirMediaErrors.req_in_progress
member.summary: You should try again, another request is still processing.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.AirMediaAPI.AirMediaErrors.connect
member.summary: Error connecting to the airmedia device.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.AirMediaAPI.AirMediaErrors.unsupported_media
member.summary: The device does not support this format.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.AirMediaAPI.AirMediaReceiver.PasswordProtected
member.summary: If set to true the receiver is protected by a password.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.AirMediaAPI.AirMediaReceiver.Capabilities
member.summary: List of receiver capabilities from the following list: photo: can display photos audio: can play audio files video: can play video files screen: can display remote screen

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.AirMediaAPI.AirMediaReceiverRequest.MediaType
member.summary: Media type photo: display a photo video: display a video

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.AirMediaAPI.AirMediaReceiverRequest.Position
member.summary: Start position for a video. The start position is expressed in percent * 1000, for instance 50 000 means 50% of the video.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.AirMediaAPI.AirMediaReceiverRequest.Media
member.summary: The media to play. For video media, you have to specify the media URL (end with .mov or .mp4, etc) For photo media, you have to specify the file path on the Freebox Server (base64 encoded as returned in fs/ls call).

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.API.APIResponse.Success
member.summary: Indicates if the request was successful.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.API.APIResponse.Result
member.summary: The result of the request. (It may be omitted if the request does not expect any result)

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.API.APIResponse.ErrorCode
member.summary: In case of request error, this ErrorCode provides information about the error. The possible ErrorCode values are documented for each API.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.API.APIResponse.Msg
member.summary: In case of error, provides a French error message relative to the error.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.API.AppPermission.Settings
member.summary: Allow modifying the Freebox settings (reading settings is always allowed).

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.API.AppPermission.PVR
member.summary: Access personal video recorder. (Not yet supported)

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.CallAPI.CallEntry.Number
member.summary: Callee number for outgoing calls. Caller number for incoming calls.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.CallAPI.CallEntry.Name
member.summary: Callee name for outgoing calls. Caller name for incoming calls. For incoming call if the network does not provide a contact name, we try to use the contact database to find a suitable name.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.CallAPI.CallEntry.New
member.summary: Call entry as not been acknowledged yet.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.CallAPI.CallEntry.ContactID
member.summary: If the number matches an entry in the contact database, the id of the matching contact.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.ConfigurationAPI.ConnectionAPI.ConnectionConfiguration.Ping
member.summary: Should the Freebox respond to external ping requests.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.ConfigurationAPI.ConnectionAPI.ConnectionConfiguration.IsSecurePass
member.summary: Is the admin password secure enough to enable remote access.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.ConfigurationAPI.ConnectionAPI.ConnectionConfiguration.RemoteAccessPort
member.summary: Port number to use for remote HTTP access.

members.member:
This field indicate the minimum possible value for RemoteAccessPort.
IPv4PortRange.

This field indicate the maximum possible value for RemoteAccessPort.
IPv4PortRange.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.ConfigurationAPI.ConnectionAPI.ConnectionConfiguration.RemoteAccessIP
member.summary: IPv4 to use for remote access (can be missing if connection is down).

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.ConfigurationAPI.ConnectionAPI.ConnectionConfiguration.APIRemoteAccess
member.summary: Is remote access enabled for apps, or share link.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.ConfigurationAPI.ConnectionAPI.ConnectionConfiguration.AdblockNotSet
member.summary: If set tot true adblock setting has never been set by the user.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.ConfigurationAPI.ConnectionAPI.ConnectionConfiguration.AllowTokenRequest
member.summary: If false, user has disabled new token request. New apps can't request a new token. Apps that already have a token are still allowed.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.ConfigurationAPI.ConnectionAPI.ConnetionIPv6Delegation.NextHop
member.summary: The next hop for the prefix.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.ConfigurationAPI.ConnectionAPI.DDNSConfig.Hostname
member.summary: DNS name to use to register.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.ConfigurationAPI.ConnectionAPI.ConnectionErrors.nodev
member.summary: No device found with this name.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.ConfigurationAPI.ConnectionAPI.ConnectionErrors.noent
member.summary: No entity found with this name.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.ConfigurationAPI.ConnectionAPI.ConnectionErrors.insecure_password
member.summary: The password is too weak to enable remote access.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.ConfigurationAPI.ConnectionAPI.ConnectionErrors.invalid_next_hop
member.summary: Invalid next hop address (should be a link local address).

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.ConfigurationAPI.ConnectionAPI.ConnectionStates.going_down
member.summary: Connection is about to become inactive.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.ConfigurationAPI.ConnectionAPI.ConnectionStatus.IPv4
member.remarks: This field is only available when connection state is up.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.ConfigurationAPI.ConnectionAPI.ConnectionStatus.IPv6
member.remarks: This field is only available when connection state is up.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.ConfigurationAPI.ConnectionAPI.ConnectionStatus.BytesUp
member.summary: Total uploaded bytes since last connection.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.ConfigurationAPI.ConnectionAPI.ConnectionStatus.BytesDown
member.summary: Total downloaded bytes since last connection.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.ConfigurationAPI.ConnectionAPI.ConnectionStatus.IPv4PortRange
member.summary: Some customers share the same IPv4 and each customer is then assigned a port range. The first value is the first port of the assigned range and the second value is the last port (inclusive). All PortForwardingConfig must use ports in this range to be effective.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.ConfigurationAPI.FreeplugAPI.EthernetPortStatus.unknown
member.summary: The ethernet port state is unknown.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.ConfigurationAPI.FreeplugAPI.Freeplug.Local
member.summary: If true the Freeplug is connected directly to the Freebox.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.ConfigurationAPI.FreeplugAPI.Freeplug.RXRate
member.summary: RX rate (from the freeplugs to the 'cco' freeplug) (in Mb/s), -1 if not available.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.ConfigurationAPI.FreeplugAPI.Freeplug.TXRate
member.summary: TX rate (from the 'cco' freeplug to the freeplugs) (in Mb/s), -1 if not available.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.ConfigurationAPI.FreeplugAPI.FreeplugNetwork.Members
member.summary: List of freeplugs member of this network.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.ConfigurationAPI.NetworkShareAPI.AFPConfig.ServerType
member.summary: AFP server type (to display proper icon) in MacOS.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.ConfigurationAPI.NetworkShareAPI.SambaConfig.LogonEnabled
member.summary: Is login/password required to access shares.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.ConfigurationAPI.UPnPAV.UPnPAVConfig.Enabled
member.summary: Is the UPnP AV service enabled.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.ContactAPI.ContactNumber.IsDefault
member.summary: Is this number the preferred contact phone number.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.ContactAPI.ContactNumber.IsOwn
member.summary: Is this number the Freebox owner number.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.DownloadAPI.DownloadErrors.task_not_found
member.summary: No task was found with the given id.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.DownloadAPI.DownloadErrors.invalid_operation
member.summary: Attempt to perform an invalid operation.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.DownloadAPI.DownloadErrors.invalid_file
member.summary: Error with the download file (invalid format?).

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.DownloadAPI.DownloadErrors.out_of_memory
member.summary: No more memory available to perform the requested action.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.DownloadAPI.DownloadErrors.need_bt_stopped_done
member.summary: This action is only valid for Bittorrent task in stopped or done state.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.DownloadAPI.DownloadErrors.bt_tracker_not_found
member.summary: Attempt to access an invalid tracker object.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.DownloadAPI.DownloadErrors.ctx_file_error
member.summary: Failed to initialize task context file (need to check disk).

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.DownloadAPI.DownloadErrors.port_outside_range
member.summary: Incoming port is not available for this customer

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.DownloadAPI.DownloadStatsAPI.DhtStats.EnabledIPv6
member.summary: Is the dht enabled on IPv6

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.DownloadAPI.DownloadStatsAPI.DhtStats.NodeCountIPv6
member.summary: Number of active nodes on IPv6.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.DownloadAPI.DownloadStatsAPI.DlThrottlingConfig.Normal
member.summary: Download rate for normal time slot (in B/s).

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.DownloadAPI.DownloadStatsAPI.DlThrottlingConfig.Slow
member.summary: Download rate for normal slow slot (in B/s).

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.DownloadAPI.DownloadStatsAPI.DlThrottlingConfig.Schedule
member.summary: The schedule array represent the list of week hours timeslot, starting on monday at midnight. Therefore the complete week is represented in a array of 168 elements (24 * 7).

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.DownloadAPI.DownloadStatsAPI.Errors.connection_refused
member.summary: Unable to connect to NNTP server.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.DownloadAPI.DownloadStatsAPI.Mode.normal
member.summary: Force use of normal rate limits (not using the scheduler).

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.DownloadAPI.DownloadStatsAPI.Mode.slow
member.summary: Force use of slow rate limits (not using the scheduler).

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.DownloadAPI.DownloadStatsAPI.Schedule.normal
member.summary: Downloads will use normal DlRate config for this timeslot.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.DownloadAPI.DownloadStatsAPI.Schedule.slow
member.summary: Downloads will use slow DlRate config for this timeslot.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.DownloadAPI.DownloadStatsAPI.Schedule.hibernate
member.summary: Downloads will be paused for this timeslot.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.DownloadAPI.DownloadStatsAPI.Status.not_checked
member.summary: Config has not been checked yet.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.DownloadAPI.DownloadStatus.stopped
member.summary: Task is stopped, can be resumed by setting the status to downloading.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.DownloadAPI.DownloadStatus.queued
member.summary: Task will start when a new download slot is available the queue position is stored in QueuePos attribute.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.DownloadAPI.DownloadStatus.starting
member.summary: Task is preparing to start download.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.DownloadAPI.DownloadStatus.error
member.summary: There was a problem with the download, you can get an error code in the error field.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.DownloadAPI.DownloadStatus.done
member.summary: The download is over. For bt you can resume seeding setting the status to seeding if the ratio is not reached yet.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.DownloadAPI.DownloadStatus.checking
member.summary: (only valid for nzb) download is over, the downloaded files are being checked using par2.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.DownloadAPI.DownloadStatus.repairing
member.summary: (only valid for nzb) download is over, the downloaded files are being repaired using par2.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.DownloadAPI.DownloadStatus.extracting
member.summary: (only valid for nzb) download is over, the downloaded files are being extracted.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.DownloadAPI.DownloadStatus.seeding
member.summary: (only valid for bt) download is over, the content is changed to being shared to other users. The task will automatically stop once the seed ratio has been reached.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.DownloadAPI.DownloadStatus.retry
member.summary: You can set a task status to 'retry' to restart the download task.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.DownloadAPI.DownloadTaskErrors.nzb_no_group
member.summary: Cannot find the requested group on server.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.DownloadAPI.DownloadTaskErrors.nzb_not_found
member.summary: Article not found on the server.

member.name: M:FreeboxAPI.Freebox.RequestAuth(FreeboxAPI.LoginAPI.TokenRequest)
member.returns: Returns whether the request is granted.

member.summary: Should the file be hidden to user.

member.summary: Number of subfolders. Only relevant for dir, only provided if "countDubFolder" parameter is set.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.FSAPI.FSFileInfo.FileCount
member.summary: Number of files inside directory. Only relevant for dir, only provided if "countSubFolder" parameter is set.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.FSAPI.FSTask.ETA
member.summary: Estimated time remaining before the task completion (in seconds).

member.summary: Size of the file currently processed.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.ParentalControlAPI.ParentalControlErrors.exist
member.summary: A rule already exists for this host.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.ParentalControlAPI.ParentalFilterPlanning.Resolution
member.summary: Planning resolution: number of planning slots per day e.g. 48 means that each slot represent 30 minutes.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.ParentalControlAPI.ParentalFilterPlanning.CDayRanges
member.summary:
List of custom day range, each custom day range represents a group of days for which you want to use a different planning than other week days. For instance a custom day range can contain the list of you children holidays
:fr_bank_holidays: French bank holidays :fr_school_holidays_a: French school holidays - Zone A :fr_school_holidays_b: French school holidays - Zone B :fr_school_holidays_c: French school holidays - Zone C :fr_school_holidays_corse: French school holidays - Corse

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.ParentalControlAPI.ParentalFilterPlanning.Mapping
member.summary: Array of states for each corresponding planning slots. The array size is: (number of CDaysRanges + 7) * Resolution

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.ParentalControlAPI.SchedulingMode.temporary
member.summary: FilterState is temporary set to TmpMode for the next TmpModeExpireSeconds.

member.name: F:FreeboxAPI.ParentalControlAPI.SchedulingMode.planning
member.summary: FilterState is set using the planning.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.WebSocketAPI.WebSocketRequest.RequestID

member.summary: The action specified in the associated WebSocketRequest.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.WebSocketAPI.WebSocketResponse.Success
member.summary: Indicates if the request was successful.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.WebSocketAPI.WebSocketResponse.Result
member.summary: The result of the request. (It may be omitted if the request does not expect any result)

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.WebSocketAPI.WebSocketResponse.ErrorCode
member.summary: In case of request error, this ErrorCode provides information about the error.

member.name: P:FreeboxAPI.WebSocketAPI.WebSocketResponse.Msg
